CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this required lookup to indicate the group to which the collateral management record is associated.
CustomField.label: Collateral Group

lookupFilter.errorMessage: This value does not exist or the type and subtype pairing of the collateral does not equal group and the group_type field is null.
lookupFilter.infoMessage: You can only associate this record with a collateral group, where the type and subtype pairing of the collateral equals group and the group_type field is not null.
